activities:
Personal Information Received from the EU/EEA and/or Switzerland:

(1) Personal data received in the course of running Latisys' business and that Latisys processes as a data controller, such as offering product registration and support; enabling sales and other transactions; conducting data analysis to improve products and services; maintaining marketing relationships; operating and maintaining the Latisys website. 

(2) Personal data received in the course of providing or performing hosting and cloud computing services and that Latisys processes as data processor on behalf of the Latisys clients, such as hosting, storing, processing, backing- up, transmitting data pursuant to a client's instructions.  These data may include the personal data of the Latisys clients (e.g. employees, business contacts) and the personal data of the Latisys clients's customers.  Some of these personal data may be human resource data.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
